When we see a running crawler get trapped in some endless junk,
we currently have no way to divert it without stopping the
crawl (and, until we have checkpointing/stopping/restarting,
losing the crawl state). 

We could add a quick-and-dirty admin UI page that allows
Filters to be added to (or removed from) the Scheduler,
Selector, or any Processor module of a running crawler
(with the proper synchronization, which already exists on
the Scheduler/Selector). 

- Gordon
